descriptionHtml:
This simple mod makes you able to forge and temper silverswords and greatswords.

Why this mod?
Why not?

It\'s mainly for people who doesn\'t want to play the Companions quest line.

I\'ve didn\'t made any changes to the stats or so. It should be compatible with every mod that affects silver swords.

To forge a silver sword you need the steel smithing perk and the same stuff you need for their steel equivalents + one or two silver ingots.

Have fun forging tons of silver weapons.
author: ImJustAGamer
